intension: Create an Instagram story advertisement for a spring sale of items related to active leisure, including sports and fitness. Encourage viewers to visit www.shopname.com for more information.
globalcaption: The image features a blue background with a white and black design. The design consists of a pair of sneakers, a sports ball, and a sports ball on the ground. The sneakers are positioned towards the top left of the image, while the sports ball is located in the middle-left area. The sports ball on the ground is situated towards the bottom-left corner of the image. The overall design appears to be a promotional poster for a spring sale.
keywords: discount, offer, promotion, retail, season, seasonal, spring, tb, sports, fitness, active, leisure, illustration, instagram, insta, ig, story

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue background with a white plus sign in the center. The plus sign is surrounded by various sports-related symbols, including a tennis racket, a baseball, a basketball, and a soccer ball. These symbols are arranged in a circular pattern around the plus sign, creating a visually appealing and sporty design
